overview.en: MS is a sub-currency of MR (MobileRadio), and the only way to obtain it is to obtain MR on Uniswap and pledge to produce MS. MS is used as a decentralized protocol for open financial systems, so anyone in the world can make financial loans anytime, anywhere. Defi will establish a transparent, open and fair peer-to-peer financial system through a decentralization agreement to minimize trust risks and make it easier for participants to obtain financing services.
overview.zh: MS为MR（MobileRadio）的子货币，唯一获得途径为Uniswap上获取MR并质押产出MS。MS用于开放式金融系统的去中心化协议，因此世界上任何人都可以随时随地进行金融贷款。Defi将通过权力下放协议建立透明，开放和公平的点对点财务系统，以最大程度地降低信任风险，并使参与者更容易获得融资服务。
